segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the sink, and it’s making me really anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t seem to notice at all, and that’s terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine someone slipping and getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids are just adding to the chaos by climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t even want to think about what could happen if the boy falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR
